# homebrew-syft

This repository contains the Homebrew formula for Syft, a tool that generates Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) from container images and filesystems.

## Purpose

The main file is `syft.rb`, which is a Homebrew formula that allows users to install Syft via:
```
brew tap anchore/syft
brew install syft
```

## Key Files

- `syft.rb` - The Homebrew formula (auto-generated by GoReleaser)
- `README.md` - Installation instructions and issue reporting guidance

## Main Project

This is a Homebrew tap for the main Syft project: https://github.com/anchore/syft

For issues with Syft itself, use the main repository. For Homebrew installation issues, use this repository.
